name: Registry Disabling LSASS PPL
description: Detects reg command lines that disables PPL on the LSA process
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\[Ll][Ss][Aa].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Aa][Dd][Dd]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Dd]\ 0.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Vv]\ [Rr][Uu][Nn][Aa][Ss][Pp][Pp][Ll]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:(/.*[Rr][Ee][Aa][Ll]\-[Tt][Ii][Mm][Ee]\ [Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Aa][Mm][Pp][Ee][Rr][Pp][Rr][Oo][Tt][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:*SYSTEM\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Lsa* AND process.command_line:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/d\ 0* AND process.command_line:*\ \/v\ RunAsPPL\ * AND process.command_line:(*Real\-Time\ Protection* OR *TamperProtection*))`
